channel.title: Madness525 Bounty Hunter | SOURCE+CLIENT! | CHAOTICS! |Full bounty hunter!~
channel.description:
Hey guys, this is my first soure EVER please dont flame:D source base = relentless ive decided to release this to the public just cuz i no longer host it and do not play rsps any more Credits go to 25% to base 50% to me 25% to trevor
Some features:
added godwars added pvp took out-if u want back in just make the command added MB added portals to godwars added customs includes Chaotics,staff of light, soulwars cape, Evil spirit shield, rocktails *dbow* fixed crator glitch fixed invy glitch added herblore fully working added overloads added corp -just need to fix the location and hits updated client All spirit shields working with divine, and ely effecs-change as needed claws working all godsword specs working Staff zone added -dont flame its not the best:S tried working on summoning(packyack can be spawned-does not folow)and no B.O.B on it donor shops added donors have logos on /chat
Some commands: ::bh ::mb -changed to portal ::godwars ::arma ::herblore ::herbhelp
Custom item codes:
Chaotic rapier: 1247 chaotic maul: 6528 Chaotic longsword: 1301 Staff of Light: 9084 Evil spirit shield: 4156 Soul wars cape: 4315 Rocktail: 391
Staff commands: ::givedonor ::takedonor ::teleto ::teletome ::Staff ::alltome ::emote ::gfx ::giveadmin ::demote ::givemod ::ipban ::mute ::unmute
Here are some of the server pictures!
[IMG]http://i1176.photobucket.com/albums/x338/madness525pk/0s2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1176.photobucket.com/albums/x338/madness525pk/0s3.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i1176.photobucket.com/albums/x338/madness525pk/0s19.png[/img]
Thanks for looking, this is my first server im a rookie lol, thanks to all the help *dbow*
SOURCE DOWNLOAD: http://uppit.com/9amkrkyk9107/madness_source.rar
CLIENT DOWNLOAD: http://uppit.com/2ha7tlggc5ur/Madness_525_v1.3.rar
To change the ip to your no-ip, so it goes to your server go to Class68_Sub20_Sub15, then just change it to your ip :D

item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Kexxlol:

this server sucks major asshole!! ill fucking log out then try to log back in the next day and it say incorect password or username and its bullshit when i go to build>data>characters>passwords> to my person… it says the password i entered the right time but on the mainsave it says a bunch of bullshit letters!!! so i entered that MOTHERFUCKER STILL WONT LOG IN!!! FUCK YOU AND YOUR SHITTY ASS SERVER!!! btw i dont know what the fuck everyone is saying it took 30 min to download when i have an average size laptop and its an eMachine an it downloaded in 6 minuets an my dad is playing mw3 hes laggin like a mofo and my downloa was fast!!! well anyways…SHITTY SERVER!!!

That Gravedig was totally necessary…

Read full topic

item.title: Madness525 Bounty Hunter | SOURCE+CLIENT! | CHAOTICS! |Full bounty hunter!~
item.dc:creator: @Text91 Text91
item.description:
@Text91 wrote:

NEEDS FIXED:

Equipment screen - I noticed when equiping certain items, it would show the inventory also
Talking to people, like the bank person, you have to right click and select “Bank Banker” instead of just clicking them.
You can’t step into the Sparkling Pool
Equipment Screen - Most of the time, if not all the time, it doesn’t show what you have equipped on the screen that shows your bonuses.
Can’t wear Dragon Platebody
I don’t know if the Santa Costume Top is even wearable, but I think it’s supposed to be (Can’t wear it)

Will add more.

Please take your time to fix these

Suggestions:
I was thinking that the Quest List tab could be used for server stats, such as staff, teleports, players online, (Max hit if you want), etc… Also if you add the players online to the tab, take away the repeating message that shows the players online.

Working teleports that don’t need runes! (Home, Lumbridge, Falador, etc… (Add in Quest List tab))

If you choose to add these, make these your last priority:
Better/More Emotes
Better Home

What I Liked
Skill Guides
Some good emotes

What I Did NOT Like (Question Form, basically make it easier to understand?)
How do I train skills?
How do I leave the place I start at? (Home?) I’m not even sure I can without teleporting

MY OPINION:
[b]Too many bad features to type out, can I even leave (Home?), can’t be in Varrock? Many bugs, not even worth Playing, sorry but it’s the truth.

Read full topic

ive decided to release this to the public just cuz i no longer host it and do not play rsps any more

fixed invy glitch
added herblore
fully working
added overloads
added corp -just need to fix the location and hits
updated client
All spirit shields working with divine, and ely effecs-change as needed
claws working
all godsword specs working
Staff zone added -dont flame its not the best:S
tried working on summoning(packyack can be spawned-does not folow)and no B.O.B on it
donor shops added
donors have logos on /chat

Some commands:
::bh
::mb -changed to portal

chaotic maul: 6528
